heading: Thursday Night
text: Clouds decreasing, doing so late in the northeast, and again increasing late in northern New York. Lows from the upper teens to mid 20s, around 30 near Lake Champlain. Winds becoming light, variable to west, except becoming southwest 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Friday
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of sprinkles, then a rising chance of afternoon showers in far northern New York, and a rising chance mid to late afternoon in northern Vermont, and south to around Lake George. Highs in the low to mid 40s, except mid 40s to around 50 in far southern valleys, and in the Champlain and Hudson valleys. South to southeast winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 20 mph east of the Greens, and to 30 mph in the west.

heading: Friday Night
text: Cloudy. Rain becoming likely, possibly mixed with snow over high terrain northeast. Lows from the upper 30s to mid 40s, some mid 30s northeast. South winds 5 to 15 mph, and gusting to 25 mph, becoming southwest.
